sentences.english: In the following spring, the seeds should be knocked out of the seed - heads and sown.
sentences.chinese: 到了第二年春天把種子從穀殼裏打出來，然後播種。

sentences.english: Hull pubescence scattered irregularly on the whole hull with distinct length.
sentences.chinese: 穀殼稃毛無規律地分佈在整個穀殼上，長短不一。

sentences.english: Hull pubescence scattered irregularly on the whole hull with distinct length.
sentences.chinese: 穀殼稃毛無規律地分佈在整個穀殼上，長短不一。

sentences.english: After the kaoliang has been steamed, rice husks are mixed in to keep it from being too sticky.
sentences.chinese: 高粱飯蒸熟後，二人加穀殼翻攪，使它不致太黏。

sentences.english: We then process these husks with some basic equipment.
sentences.chinese: 接着利用一些基本的設備來處理這些穀殼。

sentences.english: North American fern whose more or less evergreen leathery fronds are covered with pale brown chaff like scales.
sentences.chinese: 帶有淺褐色穀殼狀鱗片堅韌複葉的北美蕨類。

sentences.english: The numbers of leaf pubescences and hull pubescences were all mainly governed by major genes.
sentences.chinese: 葉片茸毛數和穀殼稃毛數都以主基因遺傳爲主。
